title: Dutch watchdog continues to cash out as it fines Apple tenth time over App Store policy
content:
For the tenth week, the Dutch watchdog has fined Apple over the lack of third-party payment options for dating apps subscriptions. This time, the Authority for Consumers and Markets could finally swipe right to Apple as it’s reached the $55 million penalties for ongoing non-compliance.

more…

The post Dutch watchdog continues to cash out as it fines Apple tenth time over App Store policy appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: For the tenth week, the Dutch watchdog has fined Apple over the lack of third-party payment options for dating apps subscriptions.
